channel.title: Mute and Jail Timers
channel.description:
How can I make a command where I can time the jails and mutes that a player recieves? For example, ::mute1 would result in a 24 hour mute, and ::jail2 would result in a 48 hour mute, etc.
So how can I add this?

item.title: Mute and Jail Timers
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

How can I make a command where I can time the jails and mutes that a player recieves? For example, ::mute1 would result in a 24 hour mute, and ::jail2 would result in a 48 hour mute, etc.
